const formatDateForICS=function(dateString){let isEndOfDay=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:false;const cleanedDateString=dateString.replace(/\(.*\)/,'').trim();const date=new Date(cleanedDateString);if(isNaN(date.getTime())){console.error("Invalid date string for ICS:",dateString);return null;}let year=date.getFullYear();let month=(date.getMonth()+1).toString().padStart(2,'0');let day=date.getDate().toString().padStart(2,'0');if(isEndOfDay){const nextDay=new Date(date);nextDay.setDate(date.getDate()+1);year=nextDay.getFullYear();month=(nextDay.getMonth()+1).toString().padStart(2,'0');day=nextDay.getDate().toString().padStart(2,'0');}return`${year}${month}${day}`;};const generateIcsContent=function(holiday){let isReminder=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:false;const title=holiday.holiday||holiday.type;const description=`Type: ${holiday.holiday?'Public Holiday':'School Holiday'}\nStates: ${holiday.states||'N/A'}`;const uid=`${Date.now()}-${Math.random().toString(36).substring(2,15)}`;const organizer='mailto:info@cuti-cuti.my';// Updated organizer email
